DOC.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Study AZD3293 ( LY3314814 ) Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: Astra Zeneca ( AZ ) register trial sponsor . In July , 2015 , sponsorship change Eli Lilly Company ( Lilly ) . In August , 2015 , AZ transfer trial Lilly 's ClinicalTrials.gov account Lilly update record . This trial applicable trial Food Drug Administration Amendments Act 2007 ( FDAAA ) .
